attributes.action: Commission a memorial to Baby P so that his memory is never allowed to fade.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That state, having failed to protect Baby P in life, should acknowledge their shortcomings and erect a fitting memorial so that for once the 'never again' line doesn't get forgotten and this type of thing never happens again.  A statue perhaps, somewhere prominent.  His case has touched the nation and the taxpayer would be more than happy to contribute to marking his case as a milestone in ending child cruelty.  Let some good come of this sorry mess.
